Uses of Class
com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisChannelHandler

  • Packages that use RedisChannelHandler 
    Package Description
    com.lambdaworks.redis
    The redis client package containing RedisClient for regular and sentinel operations.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster
    Client for Redis Cluster, see RedisClusterClient.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.protocol
    Redis protocol layer abstraction.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.pubsub
    Pub/Sub connection classes.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.sentinel
    Redis Sentinel connection classes.
